text: BindingDB assay [BDB:123456]. Target: PIK3CG (Q15858). Compound CMPD-001. IC50 = 85 nM (mean of 3). Cell line: CHO. Buffer: phosphate. Temp: 25 °C. Notes: ATP-competitive inhibitor.
BindingDB assay [BDB:223344]. Target: EGFR (P00533). Compound CMPD-002. IC50 = 12 nM (n=2). Assay format: kinase biochemical. Buffer: HEPES. Temp: 23 °C.
Predicted hERG liability: POSITIVE for CMPD-001 with probability 0.81. Model: LightGBM (TDC hERG baseline). Rationale: aromatic cationic features; cLogP moderate.
Predicted Ames mutagenicity: NEGATIVE for CMPD-001 (probability 0.72). No structural alerts in nitro-aromatics; heterocycles present but low risk.
Measured lipophilicity (AstraZeneca): logD7.4 = 2.1 (shake–flask). Method ID: AZ-SF-045. Interpretation: moderate permeability potential; solubility may be limiting if logS is low.
Predicted aqueous solubility: logS = -3.2 (mol/L). Model: GNN (AqSolDB). Guidance: borderline solubility; formulation may be required.
Caco-2 apparent permeability (Wang): Papp = 19 × 10^-6 cm/s (predicted). Efflux ratio < 2 (suggests limited P-gp efflux).
Predicted acute oral toxicity (mouse): LD50 = 580 mg/kg (Zhu). Category: moderate. Confidence: 0.63.
Tox21 screen (predicted): NR FXR antagonist = POSITIVE (score 0.63). Other NR panels: AR/ER negative at tested ranges.
Human liver microsome clearance (predicted): Clint = 32 μL/min/mg protein. Suggests moderate hepatic clearance; consider DDI risk with CYP3A4.
CYP3A4 inhibition (predicted): IC50 ≈ 3.4 μM. Classification: moderate inhibitor. Monitor potential interactions with 3A4 substrates.
BindingDB assay [BDB:123789]. Target: PIK3CG (Q15858). Compound CMPD-003. IC50 = 140 nM (n=2). Assay: radiometric. Buffer: Tris. Cofactors: Mg2+.
Predicted hERG liability: NEGATIVE (probability 0.24) for CMPD-003. Comment: reduced basic center; lower risk.
Predicted Ames: NEGATIVE (probability 0.69). No strong mutagenic alerts detected.
Predicted aqueous solubility: logS = -2.4 (mol/L). Better than CMPD-001; compatible with standard oral formulation.
Measured logD7.4 = 1.7. Lower lipophilicity vs CMPD-001; may reduce hERG risk and improve solubility.
hERG patch-clamp (BindingDB) [BDB:778899]. Inhibition at 1 μM = 46%. Estimated IC50 ≈ 1.6 μM. Temperature: 35 °C. Cells: HEK293.
ClinTox risk category: LOW (score 0.18). No historical clinical toxicity signals associated with scaffold family.
Tox21 NR AR antagonist: NEGATIVE (score 0.22). Panel summary favors a clean NR profile at tested concentrations.
Caco-2 Papp (predicted): 14 × 10^-6 cm/s. Efflux ratio ~1.4. Suggests adequate absorption with low efflux.
PK summary (predicted): moderate clearance, moderate permeability, borderline solubility. hERG POSITIVE flag (0.81). Ames NEGATIVE. Consider solubility enhancement; monitor QT risk.
